__e: A symbol of hope and peace to millions of people, would've been lost to the world forever had it not been for the bravery of one man, former detective Adrian Monk.
Adrian Monk had this much confidence to begin with... This'll probably kill him.
You work for Adrian Monk, Natalie. That makes you and your family my business.
If Adrian has the baby, that's not good.
He hasn't made a call since that night Adrian went missing.
Oh, you know what Mr. Adrian did?
Adrian, I just think it was too soon for you to go out again.
Yeah, you know, Adrian, I'm so glad you're here 'cause, uh, my mother's coming over in a little while.
Adrian, I know we've just met. But for what it's worth, I don't think you should be buying a house right now.
Adrian and I aren't doing anything right now, So I have a reason to be with someone else. It's not cheating.
Adrian and I agreed a long time ago not to discuss him.
I love you, Adrian, and I don't want you to be with anyone else.
Adrian, you hike it to me.
Adrian, you've got to stop blaming yourself. What happened on that roof is not your fault.
Well,adrian,you know,you can't be sure of that, Because nobody could possibly remember all of the people that they- Okay,I'm sorry.
And look, Adrian is a very nice woman, and I hope that you two are very happy together.
Adrian and I have been friends for a long time, and she didn't hide anything from me before, so why would she try to hide anything from me now?
Adrian is free to do anything or anyone he pleases.
